name: YAWHGIH
description:
Gameplay

In this game, your objective is to avoid traffic while driving the wrong way on the highway.
Use the jump feature on your car to get out of tricky situations.
Collect scraps to repair your car.

Credits Fonts:

karmatic arcade by vicfieger
kemco pixel by GrandChaos

Sprites:

fire sprite by KerteX_
cars by madmedicsoft
buildings by rubycave

Music:

menu: 8 Bit Loop by Ruc

in-game: Tense Battle by Kojv

game over: This Thing by Kojv

P.S.: one of the scrap pieces is a roll of duct tape if you can't recognize my terrible pixel art
